page.title: 11A Children's Game
page.content: {"London" {******** One person faces the wall while the rest are at the other end of the yard. The person spells out{ {"L-O-N-D-O-N"}while the others try to get as near as possible to touch the wall. When the person turns around the rest freeze. The person tries to make the rest laugh or move without touching them. If they move or laugh they go back to the start. The person then repeats the same words as above until someone touches the wall without being seen and says{"London"}If one of the rest is seen moving that person goes back to the start and starts again. When someone touches the wall it is their turn to face the wall.
